00007 public class ModelTowerList extends ArrayList<ModelTower> {
00008 
00009         private static int MaxAmountOfModels = 2;
00013         private static final long serialVersionUID = 7328328473966725740L;
00014 
00015         public ModelTowerList() {
00016                 super(MaxAmountOfModels); 
00017                 // We do not use more than two models as inputs or outputs simultaneously
00018         }
00019 
00020         public Map<String, String> asPathMap() {
00021                 Map<String, String> paths = new HashMap<String, String>();
00022                 for ( ModelTower mt : this ) {
00023                                 paths.put(mt.getModelID(), mt.getModel().toString());
00024                                 paths.put(mt.getMetaModelID(), mt.getMetaModel().toString());
00025                         }
00026                 return paths;
00027         }
00028 
00029         public Map<String, String> asIDMap() {
00030                 Map<String, String> models = new HashMap<String, String>();
00031                 for ( ModelTower mt : this ) {
00032                         models.put(mt.getModelID(), mt.getMetaModelID());
00033                 }
00034                 return models;
00035         }
00036 
00037         public Map<String, String> asHandlersMap() {
00038                 Map<String, String> handlers = new HashMap<String, String>();
00039                 for ( ModelTower mt : this ) {
00040                         handlers.put(mt.getMetaModelID(), "EMF");
00041                 }
00042                 return handlers;
00043         }
00044 }
